label: weather.get.success.sunny
answers: Weather is sunny and temperature outside is {{ temperature }} {{ units }}.

label: weather.get.success.raining
answers: It's raining and temperature outside is {{ temperature }} {{ units }}.

label: weather.get.fail
answers: There was an error while getting the weather.

label: weather.get.fail.not-configured
answers: You need to configure DarkSky API in the Integration tab before using this feature.
